A C G K N S T V 

A

authenticate(String) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Authenticates with the television using host IP address for the ip and id parameters.
authenticate(String, String, String) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Authenticates with the television.

C

checkConnection() - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Checks the connection by sending an empty key code, does not return anything but instead throws an exception when a problem arose (for instance the TV turned off).
close() - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Closes the socket connection.

G

getLog() - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Returns a simple log with for instance TV response payloads as string array, will only be filled when this class is constructed with debug true (otherwise the array will be empty).

K

Keycode - Enum in net.afiake.smarttvapi
A list of available key codes, just for easy reference.
keycode(Keycode) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Sends a key code to TV, blocks shortly waiting for TV response to check delivery.
keycode(String) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Sends a key code to TV, blocks shortly waiting for TV response to check delivery.
keycodeAsync(Keycode) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Sends a key code to TV in a non-blocking manner, thus it does not check the delivery (use checkConnection() to poll the TV status).
keycodeAsync(String) - Method in class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Sends a key code to TV in a non-blocking manner, thus it does not check the delivery (use checkConnection() to poll the TV status).

N

net.afiake.smarttvapi - package net.afiake.smarttvapi
 

S

SmartRemote - Class in net.afiake.smarttvapi
API for controlling Samsung Smart TVs using a socket connection on port 55000.
SmartRemote(String) - Constructor for class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Opens a socket connection to the television.
SmartRemote(String, boolean) - Constructor for class net.afiake.smarttvapi.SmartRemote
Opens a socket connection to the television and keeps a simple log when debug is true.

T

TVReply - Enum in net.afiake.smarttvapi
TV response after authentication.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum net.afiake.smarttvapi.Keycode
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
valueOf(String) - Static method in enum net.afiake.smarttvapi.TVReply
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
values() - Static method in enum net.afiake.smarttvapi.TVReply
